entry.title: SeaTex Eco Polygiene Performance Mask (Stripes)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Face Mask
Price: 9.95

  • Antibacterial Treatment 
  • Sustainable SeaWool 
  • Odor-Block & Quick Dry
  • Heat Retention
  • UV 50+ 

The SeaTex Eco Performance Mask offers maximum protection with sustainable production. Made with 2 layers of SeaWool, 100% recycled PET water bottles and oyster shells, spun into Polyester. SeaWool is anti-static and offers UV+ 50 with a superior warmth-to-weight ratio. The layers are treated with Polygiene®, an eco-friendly antibacterial finish using Silver Salt (Silver Chloride) to prevent the growth of odor-causing microbes. Train at ease with the lightweight design, pliable nose guard, adjustable straps and Polygiene® storage bag.

Care: Machine wash cold and air dry. 

Materials: 100% Recycled Polyester with an Antibacterial Polygiene® Treatment. 

Size: Regular: (6.5" Length, 9” Width) & Small: (5.75" Length, 8.25" Width)

entry.title: SilTex Polygiene Performance Mask (Black Camo)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Face Mask
Price: 9.95

  • 2-Ply Design 
  • Cooling Technology
  • Antibacterial Odor-Block
  • Quick Dry
  • UV 50+ 

Maximize your comfort and protection with the antibacterial SilTex Performance Mask, constructed with 2 layers of fabric. The layers are treated with Polygiene®, a sustainable antibacterial finish using Silver Salt (Silver chloride) that prevents the growth of odor-causing microbes: bacteria, fungus and mildew. The inner layer, made with a 76% Nylon + 24% Polyester blend, provides a cool to the touch effect. Train at ease with the lightweight design, pliable nose guard, adjustable straps and Polygiene® storage bag. 

Care: Machine wash cold and air dry.

Size: Available in two sizes: Regular: (6.5" Length, 9” Width) & Small: (5.75" Length, 8.25" Width)

entry.title: ZinTex Antimicrobial Reusable 3-Ply Sports Mask (Pink)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Face Mask
Price: 9.00

Features:

  • 3-Ply Fabric
  • Zinc Oxide Protection
  • Droplet Infection Proof
  • 3M Water Repellent
  • Cooling Technology

The ZinTex Antimicrobial Sports Mask is constructed using Zinc Oxide treated fabrics, one of the safest and effective antimicrobial treatments on the market. Shield your face from exterior elements with the two water repellent outer layers made of 100% Polyester. Featuring a cool effect technology which prevents overheating during heavy workouts. The honeycomb interior design is printed using antibacterial paint. Train at ease with the breathable design, pliable nose guard and adjustable straps.

Materials: 100% Polyester exterior & middle layer, 100% Nylon lining.

Care: Machine wash in cold water and air dry.
